allow:
Bash(powershell -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -File - <<'PS1'
$claudeDir = Join-Path $env:USERPROFILE '.claude'
Write-Host "=== .claude directory contents ==="
Get-ChildItem $claudeDir -Name -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue

Write-Host "`n=== settings.json ==="
$settingsPath = Join-Path $claudeDir 'settings.json'
if \(Test-Path $settingsPath\) { Get-Content $settingsPath } else { Write-Host "NOT FOUND" }

Write-Host "`n=== Notification scripts installed? ==="
Write-Host "claude-notify.ps1: $\(Test-Path \(Join-Path $claudeDir 'claude-notify.ps1'\)\)"
Write-Host "claude-tab-active.ps1: $\(Test-Path \(Join-Path $claudeDir 'claude-tab-active.ps1'\)\)"
Write-Host "focus-terminal.ps1: $\(Test-Path \(Join-Path $claudeDir 'focus-terminal.ps1'\)\)"
Write-Host "focus-terminal.vbs: $\(Test-Path \(Join-Path $claudeDir 'focus-terminal.vbs'\)\)"

Write-Host "`n=== Console Encoding ==="
Write-Host "OutputEncoding: $\([Console]::OutputEncoding.EncodingName\)"
Write-Host "CodePage: $\([Console]::OutputEncoding.CodePage\)"
Write-Host "chcp:"
chcp
PS1)
